product_metadata.title: ₹5 Crore Term Insurance Plan
product_metadata.target_audience: Newly Married Couples, Couple with Young Kids, Young Professionals, Individuals Nearing Retirement

product_summary.objective: To provide high life insurance coverage of ₹5 Crore to secure the financial future of the family against risks like premature demise.
highlights: Tax Benefits up to ₹46,800 under Section 80C
Online discount of 6% for regular premium payment

plan_variants.description: Pure term insurance with death benefit.
Premiums paid are refunded on maturity if the insured survives the policy tenure.

core_benefits.description: Sum assured of ₹5 Crore paid to the nominee if the insured passes away during the policy tenure.
No benefit under normal term plans. Return of Total Premiums Paid available under Return of Premium variant.
Premiums eligible for deduction under Section 80C. Death benefit tax-free under Section 10(10D).

special_options: Life Stage Upgrade (increase sum assured on marriage/childbirth)
discounts: 5% Discount for first individual life insurance policy

riders: Bajaj Life New Critical Illness Benefit Rider
Bajaj Accidental Permanent Total/Partial Disability Rider

sample_illustrations.description: Male, 23 years, Non-Smoker, Policy Term 30 years, Premium Payment Term 30 years, Sum Assured ₹3 Cr

compliance_rules.disclaimer: Insurance is subject to terms and conditions. Please read the sales brochure and policy document carefully before purchase.
compliance_rules.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_rules.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to provisions of Section 80C and Section 10(10D) of the Income Tax Act, 1961. Consult your tax advisor.

retrieval_chunks.text: A ₹5 crore term insurance plan offers a sum assured of ₹5 crores paid as death benefit if the insured passes away. It replaces lost income and secures the family's financial future.
Get life cover of ₹5 Crore starting at ₹37/day. Includes options for regular, limited, or single premium payment frequencies.
The plan offers a Return of Premium option where total premiums paid are refunded if the life assured survives the policy tenure.
Enhance coverage with riders like Critical Illness, Accidental Death Benefit, and Waiver of Premium for nominal extra cost.
Premiums are tax-deductible up to ₹1.5 lakh under Section 80C. Death benefits are tax-free under Section 10(10D).
Ideal for newly married couples, parents with young kids, young professionals, and individuals nearing retirement seeking substantial financial protection.
